name: O Cangaceiro
description:
O Cangaceiro is a Brazilian project game inspired on a banditry phenomenon ocurred between XVIII and XX century in Brazil Northeast.  Developed by  : UnionFour 

(Bruno Aguiar , Felipe Adalberto , Ian Caliel and Gustavo Duarte) 

Future Updates : - Full game experience with a final boss fight - Endless mode with procedurally generated terrain and enemy spawn rate increasing over time - New weapons - New map / New levels - New mechanics [ Wall jump , Sliding , Knife close combat , and more]
